text: Keep your resume design simple and scannable to ensure hiring managers can quickly find key information.
source: Coursera: '16 Resume Tips for Your 2025 Job Search'

text: Optimize your resume for Applicant Tracking Systems (ATS) by using standard fonts and including relevant keywords from the job description.
source: Coursera: '16 Resume Tips for Your 2025 Job Search'

text: Use a clean and minimalistic layout with clear headings and bullet points to enhance readability and ATS compatibility.
Include a professional summary at the top of your resume to provide a concise overview of your qualifications and career goals.
source: Vault: '5 Ways to Prep Your Resume for 2025'

text: Quantify your achievements with specific metrics to demonstrate the impact of your work and stand out to employers.
source: Indeed: '10 Resume Writing Tips To Help You Land a Position'

text: Tailor your resume for each job application by aligning your skills and experiences with the specific requirements of the position.
source: ResumeGenius: 'Resume Tips to Land a Job in 2025'

text: Avoid using generic soft skills; instead, provide context and examples to illustrate your competencies.
source: ResumeGenius: 'Resume Tips to Land a Job in 2025'

text: Use a professional email address that includes your name to convey professionalism and make it easy for employers to contact you.
source: Coursera: '16 Resume Tips for Your 2025 Job Search'

text: Stick to a one-page resume to keep information concise and focused, especially if you have less than 10 years of experience.
source: ResumeGenius: 'Resume Tips to Land a Job in 2025'

text: Ensure consistent formatting throughout your resume, including font styles, sizes, and spacing, to maintain a professional appearance.
source: Harvard University: 'Tips to create a Strong Resume'
